title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, March 31
description: The latest Trump campaign drama and a look at the big upcoming primary votes in Wisconsin and New York, plus listener mail and what the NPR Politics team just can't let go this week. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, campaign reporter Asma Khalid, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, and national political correspondent Don Gonyea. Find the team on Twitter and at nprpolitics.org, or email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
